title: Agent Files Memory Persistence Update
content:
Updated all 12 Copilot agent files in .github/agents/ to use the correct agentic-tools-mcp memory persistence instructions.

**Changes Made:**
1. Replaced outdated "3-Tier Memory System" (In-Memoria, Agentic-Tools, Persistent-Memory) with single "Agentic-Tools MCP" system
2. Updated all file paths from `.agentic-tools/` to `.agentic-tools-mcp/`
3. Removed references to `.in-memoria/` and `.mcp-data/` directories (not configured)
4. Added Memory Search workflow section to all agent files with example code
5. Updated MCP integration sections to reference Agentic-Tools MCP for memory operations
6. Updated workflow steps to include memory search as first step
7. Updated commit checklists to reference correct memory directory

**Files Updated:**
- bug-architect.md
- bug-fixer.md
- feature-builder.md
- feature-optimizer.md
- master-orchestrator.md
- quicktabs-cross-tab-agent.md
- quicktabs-manager-agent.md
- quicktabs-single-tab-agent.md
- quicktabs-unified-agent.md
- refactor-specialist.md
- ui-ux-settings-agent.md
- url-detection-agent.md

**Memory Persistence Section Now Includes:**
- Location: `.agentic-tools-mcp/` directory
- Mandatory commit instructions
- Memory search workflow with code example
- List of available memory tools (create, search, get, update, list)

**Impact:**
All custom Copilot agents will now correctly use the agentic-tools-mcp server and persist memories to the right location, enabling knowledge retention across agent sessions.
